title: Hidden Memories of a Bright Summer [FINAL] 2013 (HOG) Foxy Games
description:
Game Description:
******************
After having spent many childhood summers there, the estate you have inherited is abandoned and in a state of total disrepair. While you are tidying up one of the rooms, you stumble upon a page from a secret diary belonging to the houseÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s previous owner. As you read it, you realize that it is actually addressed to you! What secret is this mysterious diary hiding? Is there more to this estate than a simple inheritance? 

Game Features:
***************
-Visit your huge estate freely as you search for clues.
-Relive moments from the propertyÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s past through recurring flashbacks.
-Use various objects to access the most secret places in your property.
-Discover all the objects you need in the different scenes!
-Unearth the secrets of this estate with the help of your loyal companion: Beer!
- NEW HIDDEN OBJECT GAME!
